alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 21 at 11:16AM AKST until February 23 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility less than one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...From noon today to 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could blow items around. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief break in the blizzard conditions is expected Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
